name: Claw Machine 3D 2.0
description:
Controls: ***Arrow Keys (or WASD) = Move Claw** **Enter = Drop claw**

Character models are game rips from Models-resource.com

Made this project to practice 3D game design. I had to create rigs for each character and setup ragdoll physics suitable for a low end WEB GL game. Making it all work was not easy. The physics are not perfect yet but I plan on working with the Unity forums to improve them over time.

Thanks for playing!
